Example.Name: TIMER_Example
Example.Description:
Timer0 toggles PIN64:PB8_TM0 every 10ms and PIN10:PB4_LED blinks every 1s at Duty=10% Timer1, count pulse from PIN32:PB9_TM1.Connect this PIN to PIN10,you can watch TDR1 increasing Timer2 capture pulse from PIN23:PB2_T2EX, Please connect this PIN to PIN10 PIN64 will output 1KHz wave.
Please watch DEBUG UART1 window while debug routines. And watch the value of TDR1
